original_text: And there was a gate in the inner court toward the south: and he measured from gate to gate toward the south an hundred cubits.
korean_text: 안뜰에도 남쪽을 향한 문간이 있는데 그가 남쪽을 향한 그 문간에서 맞은쪽 문간까지 측량하니 백 척이더라

sentences.original_text: And there was a gate in the inner court toward the south
and he measured from gate to gate toward the south
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 남쪽 성문에서 성문까지를 측량했다
